snippet: The nation's No. 3 cellphone carrier reported a fourth-quarter loss of $1.3 billion, or 43 cents a share, on revenue that climbed 5 percent to $8.7 billion. Read more »
abstract: The nation's No. 3 cellphone carrier reported a fourth-quarter loss of $1.3 billion, or 43 cents a share, on revenue that climbed 5 percent to $8.7 billion. Read more »

headline.main: Sprint Posts Net Loss but Revenue Gain on iPhone
